itemDescription: painter from the Northern Netherlands (born in London) (1887-1934)

wikipedia_page.main: Stephen Robert Koekkoek (15 October 1887, in London – 20 December 1934, in Santiago) was an English-born painter of Dutch descent who worked in the Postimpressionist style. He was part of the Koekkoek family of painters.

response: Witjens also did illustrations for the books of poet Mario Luis Descotte.  He befriended and exhibited with other artists, such as British Stephen Robert Koekkoek, and Argentinians José Félix Rolla, Fernando Fader, Miguel Burgoa Videla, Alberto M. Rossi, and Luis Aquino.
